content.text: Hey there! What do you do for fun?
I love to dance, but I also have a pet iguana that I love to take care of.
I am a personal chef for a meatloaf catering business. I love to cook!
That's awesome! I'm originally from a small town in the Midwest but I've been living in the city for a few years now.
That's cool! I'm from the East Coast but I moved to the Midwest a few years ago for work.
Do you have any pets? I have an iguana named Sparky.
I don't have any pets because I spend most of my time at work or at the bar.
That's understandable. I wish I could spend more time with Sparky but I'm always so busy with work and school.
I'm sure Sparky understands. I'm sure he's a great pet!
He's the best! He's so sweet and cuddly.
That's awesome! I'm glad you have such a great pet.
Thanks! What's your favorite thing about your job?
I love being able to create delicious food for people. It's so much fun to see their faces light up when they taste my food.
That's awesome! I'm sure you're very good at your job.
Thanks! I try my best.
I'm sure you're great! What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love to cook all kinds of food, but my favorite is probably meatloaf.
That's funny! I love meatloaf too!
It's the best! I love making different variations of it.
That's awesome! I'm sure your meatloaf is amazing!
Thanks! I think so too
